name: Unhinged
description:
Unhinged is a first-person psychological thriller game inspired by the likes of PT and Resident Evil. Wander around your massive, empty house as you solve puzzles to uncover a dark mystery haunting your character and the house.

Featuring 

  • A creepy horror atmosphere with environmental storytelling 
  • Puzzle-solving 
  • Stealth horror gameplay, and more! 

Controls - Move with WASD. Use the left mouse button to interact and the right mouse button to unlock if you have a key. Press TAB for inventory.
